txt.en: Help to further reinforce the stronghold at Lugazag by collecting materials to reinforce the gate. You will find all you need throughout the Ettenmoors.
'You will find the wood and iron throughout the Ettenmoors. Make haste, the enemy is sure to return with rams to batter down the gate.'
With Lugazag captured and the gate built, you are asked to turn your attention to upgrading the gate for greater defence.

'We have done well to capture the tower of Lugazag and built a gate to defend the location, but the enemy is relentless and will return. To strengthen our position we must do what we can to reinforce the gate.\n\n'Make your way back into the wilds of the Ettenmoors, collect the wood and iron we need to reinforce the gate here.'
'I will see that the door is reinforced with this delivery. We will hold this location and press our advantage here in the Ettenmoors.\n\n'Thank you for your continued efforts in this harsh land.'
Defence: Reinforce the Gate of Lugazag
